Vulnerability.Description: The K Desktop Environment (KDE) is a graphical desktop environment for the X Window System. The kdelibs packages include core libraries for the K Desktop Environment. Security Fix(es): * A privilege escalation flaw was found in the way kdelibs handled D-Bus messages. A local user could potentially use this flaw to gain root privileges by spoofing a callerID and leveraging a privileged helper application. (CVE-2017-8422) Red Hat would like to thank Sebastian Krahmer (SUSE) for reporting this issue.
Vulnerability.Name: RHSA-2017:1264
